website_summaries.verdict: If you require all-day relief, this portable back and neck massager is a solid choice. Highly effective at working out knots and tightness and it can just as easily be used in the car or at the office.
pros: Features a total of 8 roller balls (4 big and 4 small) to deliver a deep tissue massage virtually anywhere on the body
Soothing infrared heat function relieves tension and boosts blood circulation
Positioning handles makes it easy to access hard to reach areas
Comes with a wall adapter, a car adapter, and a carry bag for transportation

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this thing is amazing i have fibromyalgia and constantly in pain i can put this anywhere on my body where im in pain and i dont have to bother my family to rub me where i hurt and they love using it too it helps so much!😍
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Salazar-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works for my fibromyalgia and stress work relieve
customer_reviews.text: It’s a wonderful way to relax before going to bed. Been helping with my fibromyalgia and work stress related. Do you know those tender points in your body that seems to never go away? This massager can help with that when you’re watching tv. I’m very pleased with and recommend it 100% to everybody! I forgot to mention that it has two speeds and you use the weight of your body “control it” but common sense it’s important do not put to much pressure to the point where the machine will almost or totally stop. Just a friendly tip.
customer_reviews.author: ☀️Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: pain pain go away
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I've have horrible pain in my neck and back for years. Used it for the first time today and oh my goodness it feels wonderful. Love the heat and how powerful the massage!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Jagged edge on massager; Literally held together by masking tape
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a gift recently and was very excited. Unfortunately, during the first few uses I noticed that one of the massager knobs had a jagged edge which was getting caught on the fabric and tearing it apart. When I took it apart to investigate, I found that the inner mechanism was being held together by masking tape. Surprised this product has such great reviews. It gives solid massages, but clearly is not going to last me very long.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this get this brand.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. The motor on the massager os not strong enough to even move on my back, shoulder or neck and the device stoops working with even the smallest amount of pressure. Added 4/9/2020; now these guys are trying to pay me to take this down. If anything this should confirm this product is junk. I will edit and add photos of the e-mails if amazon will let me soon.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great but fabric ripped
customer_reviews.text: I've loved it but the fabric ripped a couple of months ago:( I'm a teacher and stand all day. It was wonderful to keep in my classroom to use during my planning. I wish I could still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pebley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product works well but makes a loud squeaking noise at times
customer_reviews.author: Coree

customer_reviews.title: It Feels Like Rolling Cold Stones on Your Back. It hurts more after use,
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain in neck and lower back. I bought this hoping it will help. However, to my utter disappointment I found out that many of the claims made by this seller are completely FALSE. Their listing states that it heats up, but it does not heat up at all. It is heavy and feels like rolling cold rocks on your muscles. It is a horrible feeling. In fact after trying it for few minutes I felt worse than before using it. I am returning this. It is waste of time and money. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: ... used it 4 or 5 times already and it's AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it but have used it 4 or 5 times already and it's AWESOME!!!! I will update this review further, in a few months! *** One suggestion I would offer to the company....you shoukd offer strap "extensions" for those (with limited flexibility, like my father) that want to hold the straps but use the massager on their feet. We improvised with some bungee chords....but it's just a thought...in case the company wants to sell accessories....??
customer_reviews.author: TC.

customer_reviews.title: I still want my money back please.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this has a gift... My daughter bought me one I loved it so I bought one from my brother who has an auto immune disease. Was hoping it would stimulate his nerves ...and it stopped working on two uses. He never went over the 15 minute limit. Now I can’t get my money back because I’m two days reporting this after it can be returned. I’m upset....
customer_reviews.author: kim maxey rumsey

customer_reviews.title: Massager was awesome! For a half an hour!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! I used this product a total of three times before it slowly died and never worked again. I was very upset , and let down. Bad first and last impression with this company. Could just be a manufacturing error, but products should be checked before they leave the warehouse to see if they are in working order. I would not reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ralph David pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a new product. And it has obviously been used. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: We received a previously opened item. the AC adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: We received a previously opened item. the AC adapter and user manual was missing. When we opened the box, we found the travel bag with the massager and car adapter inside the travel bag. there was no protective plastic packaging on any of the items. a straight from factory boxed item would have had each item packaged separately in protective plastic.
customer_reviews.author: lmeyenii

customer_reviews.title: Limited power
customer_reviews.text: Update: Very disappointed to receive an email with a bribe from the seller to give me a full refund, plus $100 to remove this review, whihc is just wrong. I am lowering my review from 3 stars to one star because of the email bribe. Original review: Limitedd on adjustability for the size of person, limited power, so you are not able to go very deep on the massage. No battery pack, so must keep it plugged in. Overall it's decent and not a bad value, but if you're going to spend the $ ob a massager it's probably worth getting a more powerful one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Was good but...
customer_reviews.text: It was really good at first time use. After about 7days, its getting weak. Looks its gonna not working at all soon.. so sad
customer_reviews.author: Was casino dealer in vegas

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been suffering with neck pain for years. I see a chiropractor and a massage therapist. My traps are always hard like rocks. Recently I started stretching and purchased this to help break down the tension. I use it nightly and have seen a dramatic decrease in my neck pain and headaches. The power cord is a little short and it still smells like fake leather but other than that I have no complaints and those issues do not change my 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Jonisha P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: The massager is awesome. I have tons of health issues and it really works on back , shoulders, and neck BUT after maybe 7 to 8 uses the switch has already gone out. This stinks because it was not inexpensive and it actually works to relieve my pain. I'm very upset about a limited return policy and will be drastically decreasing orders from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: crystal Bernick

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months before it died
customer_reviews.text: Update: I emailed the company InvoSpa about the massager breaking after a few months. A rep got back to me later that day and was helpful and apologized about the issue. They are sending me a brand new neck massager without having to send the old one back. On the website, it states that there is a 90 day warranty on the product. This was a great product, until it suddenly stopped working. I bought this three months ago for my dad, who used it maybe a few times a week. Now it’s completely dead and won’t turn on or charge. Seems like a pretty short lifespan for a product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Completely stopped working my four months and barely used it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product it broke within less than six months and they wouldn’t let me return it
customer_reviews.author: Jen Giesfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Shop other models first!
customer_reviews.text: The massager was ok except for the following: 1) The controller is in a very awkward position. When u hv ur arms thru the straps, u hv to pull ur right arm out to use the controller, which allows the massager to fall away from ur back 2) The heater is crap 3) When I pull not really that hard, the motors quit running. I’m not sure if it’s something with the unit or what because I really don’t pull that hard. I wish I would have looked at more models
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product and very weak. Forget about adding any pressure because it slows down almost to a stop and the motor seems like its struggling. ***update***8-13-18 Although the product is worth 1 star, the customer service rocks! Nicole from the company emailed me and gave me a refund. I didnt know such good customer service existed. 5 stars for the company actually caring about their customers! I would definitely order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, but very rough
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, but very rough , returned. UPDATED Seller contacted me about the product , and I tried it once again, I still love the design and the bag it comes in.I have adjusted the way I use it by holding it looser when using on my back,I find that by doing that there is less pressure and roughness, I guess you just need to use it a few times to acclimate yourself to it.I give it a 5 star ,and would recommend to someone who needs some muscle relief after a long day , plus absolute 5 stars for the design and look.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Can be taken wherever you go , in it’s carrying bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this for sore muscle aches on my shoulders and neck area . It’s easy to use . I like that it has a carry bag , so it can be taken easily anywhere you go.
customer_reviews.author: m&m53

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is another product which I have to change the rating on because it worked good at first and then within months it breaks . One of the main issues is with the wiring hookup that tore and so I reached out to the company for information on a replacement and was given two links on Amazon - one of a car charger one that is not needed and the other at home plug in - which is out of stock and apparently there is not any info on when or if it will be back in stock . Just a plain and simple scam. Disappointing! I recommend shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: AJW

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail today. It is good quality and gets right down to the center of your muscles! If you move your head to get the perfect position you’ll get a serious massage! Kind of hurts if you put your weight on it but works very well if there is just light pressure. I’ve used it for about a half hr and I’ll tell you my neck feels great!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZeppFan1

customer_reviews.title: Broke pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: This thing was AMAZING...for a few weeks. It broke pretty soon after I received it. It's cheap enough that I'd buy a replacement, but it's really not worth it if they have a two month shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: feelingrooovy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: This hurts when you try to use it on your neck. If you position it a certain way if feels good on your back. We use it on our calf muscles mostly. My 13 yr old son plays travel baseball and he uses this after a wknd of playing ball. He lays his arm on top of it. The heat is nice, it does what it says, we just can’t use it on our neck which is what we bought it for. It maybe different for you, it just didn’t work for us for the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Marriedasouthernman

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from neck and back pain. My wife also has neck pain so I thought it would be worth a try. The massager seems to be made well. I like the handles for your hands so you can control the pressure of the rotating balls on your neck. The heater portion of the unit really didn't seem warm much at all. The biggest disappointment in the unit was that it pushed my head forward and was hard to position and hold it in the right spot. It was an aggressive unit but it has fallen behind the couch and I'm afraid it will remain there. I probably should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: big and bulky and really not much of a massage
customer_reviews.text: I returned the item. It was big and bulky and it just has few bulky rotating thing inside that might work except you have to really hold onto it to get it to do any kind of deep massage. But if you hold it too tight against you, it stops rotating. There is definitely no physical heat (not sure about UV). I tried on shoulders, leg, and other places recommended. None of it really worked for me. Maybe it might work for something much larger.
customer_reviews.author: vamsally

customer_reviews.title: Good massage but not flexible
customer_reviews.text: The handles make this massager easier to position and hold in place, but the massage area is not flexible and will not mold to the neck, shoulder, calf, or other body parts pictured in the advert. The plastic used has a strong odor that doesn’t seem to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: JMDC

customer_reviews.title: Important info
customer_reviews.text: New Review: UPDATE! Company sent me a new device. So far so good. If there’s trouble I’ll report back. I do love this thing. Old review: Junk. Fell apart three times and I had to screw back together. Now my return window is closed and I’m stuck with a broken device. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: BLD11

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Breaks down after a few uses. Mine found its way to the garbage can. Continue shopping. They even tried to bribe me with a gift card to delete my review.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking for this All my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: So this device gives me the same sensation as using a tennis ball or baseball without having to use the wall to get the right spots in my neck and shoulder. The hard plastic rotating knobs reminder me of my masseurs magic elbow. I have a crochet business and I end up with tendinitis in my shoulder and neck in the winter months. This really helps in between visits to my Chiropractor and Masseur. It's way better than the vibrating neck massagers with heat. Mind you if you are looking for a deep tissue type massaging device then this is for you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Keddy

customer_reviews.title: Best massager Ever! Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Everyone NEEDS this massager! The best I've found, and I've tried a lot of varieties. I'm a horse trainer and work 7 days a week 12-15 hour days. My body takes a beating. I love how easy to use... all over, the more firm you hold the arm straps the deeper the massage. Just the right amount of pressure to be comfortable not painful. The heat is not very strong but given the right amount of massage pressure and ability to change the direction of the kneading massage, it just works great! Pretty color and nice duffle bag case to store it in too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa V.

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly Excellent massaging
customer_reviews.text: My spouse enjoyed the neck massage. But for me the star of this was its ability to message the calf. It really was fantastic. Unfortunately the motor stopped working within a few weeks which greatly disappointing us as it was perfect up til it broke. It wasn't even used hard. It simply stopped working. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: garbulky

customer_reviews.title: This will save you thousands of dollars and make you feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God! This is fabulous. I've been suffering from constant pain in my lower back since last summer, and I've spent thousands of dollars on therapy to correct it. I laid down on my massage table and placed this massager on the lower lumbar and up to the lower thorax area for 15 minutes and pain disappeared and has been gone all day. I'm using it on my shoulders, tight hamstrings, etc. There will be a bunch of these going under the tree this year.
customer_reviews.author: Lazell

customer_reviews.title: Bad workmanship
customer_reviews.text: After using for short time, the ine side if the roller stopped heating and have no light. We hear screws loss sound when using. I expect better and more durable of your product. I am very disappointed and in process of returning and shipping back the product.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Cereno

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year
customer_reviews.text: I use it for mid/upper back pain, and it works pretty well. I prefer to lean back on it while sitting, and never bother using the hand holds. The product lasted about 15 months before the fabric covering the massage nodes deteriorated and ripped open. I've used smaller shiatsu massage pillows in the past, and they would only they last about 6 months. So not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: LOSES STRENGHTH QUICKLY
customer_reviews.text: I got this in April 2020, I guess as of may 31st it was no longer eligible for a return. It worked great the first few times I used it but it seems like it’s lost its power/strength soon after. I have a TON of tension and knots in my shoulders, so maybe that’s what wore it out. Regardless I’m super disappointed about that because I haven’t even 3 whole months. The massager itself is ok. It’s sits on your shoulders a little awkward and bulky, you can only sit up or sit leaning forward while using it. So if you wanted to lean, lay or sit back while using this, it’s not for you I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of scared it will break soon. Not even a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Used for less than a month and it is making strange squeaky noise already. It also sound like something metal or plastic got loose inside because it keeps making a clanking noise. Also, the fabric looks like it is about to rip. For the record, I didn't use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I imagined this for years. Glad they made it. Must have read my mind. Works well on this slots by shoulder blades.
customer_reviews.author: osborntownroad

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t put much stock into reviews as I feel they reflect the customer’s expectations and not the facts of the products so here are facts: I’ve had a frozen shoulder developing since November 2019 and after using this massager twice I have less pain and more range of motion. I scrunch up my shoulders and it relaxed my neck and shoulders amazing. I started using it all over my back the second time and it was equally helpful and felt amazing. It is a little bulky however I don’t intend on putting it under a sweatshirt and leaving the house. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works for right neck and shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I work at a computer all day, so my neck and shoulders are always super tight. I’ve tried several different tools to help at home relief but they’ve all fallen short. My husband gifted me this for my birthday and it’s a game changer. It really digs deep into the right muscles and can easily be moved around to target different areas. I like that you can relax and not have to put in much effort to control the device. My neck and shoulders feel so much better after only one use. Will be using it often for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Fiancé loves it! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My Fiancé loves his gift! He says it works great, easy to pop on and use. The carrying case fits everything well. He used it well we watched a movie and it wasn’t too loud at all. He often gets shoulder aches and this does the job at relieving it. I like that you can adjust the pressure just by tugging a little more or less on the arm sleeves. EDIT: With only having it for about a month now, the zipper piece to the bag broke. Disappointed that we can no longer zip up the bag but the actual massager still works great and I guess that’s the main part anyway. But I removed a star for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So pissed. Had high hopes, but very dissapointed. Battery life is not satisfying. Also it no longer powers on and it doesnt seem like it can be fixed!Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Kertzmann

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, tore open with regular use. can’t return and it hasn’t evenbeen a month
customer_reviews.text: This massager seemed fine until of course, just very shortly after the window to return closed. I got this as a gift for my father and not even a month into having this massager, the fabric seam split/ripped all the way open, exposing the mechanicals of the massager and hurting him in the process. I would greatly appreciate a refund for this item, since no one can use it for any longer.
customer_reviews.author: B M Olso

customer_reviews.title: A Real Massage!
customer_reviews.text: I received this a few weeks ago and I have a new best friend! Oh my! As close to a good massage as you can get from a product and better than many I’ve had from a real person. I like deep tissue massage and thought I could never get that from a device but this delivers. It has three level of intensity and you can adjust through your grip on the “reins” as well. That is the true genius of the product. Shipping was fast and the product was expertly packaged. Now I just hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Varn

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life...
customer_reviews.text: After buying a much more expensive sports medicine muscle massager gun I was skeptical to buy this because I wasn’t sure if it would be able to be as pinpoint accurate, but I must admit it is everything I had hoped it was. Very easy to use, versatile, and is worth every penny! I would buy another one so that my partner and I don’t fight over who gets to use this one and who is stuck with the other more expensive massager! This type of massager is much easier to use on yourself for those hard to reach places like your shoulders and your feet than a massage gun or stick massager. 100% would recommend this massager!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. Heibel

customer_reviews.title: If you can't get to the masseuse...
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful tool especially usefully if you can't get to the massage therapist or between sessions. Use with caution, as I have found that forcing too much pressure or prolonged use will definitely leave you aching the next day! It is made of high quality material and the carrying case is also of high quality material, not a flimsy bag. So far it has held up well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: poeticlibra

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very deep! Feels amazing! Love the design. High quality. Easy to use. I’ve already used it on multiple parts of the body. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Krys..

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not packaged for gifting
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky. Otherwise, acceptable. A belt that would hold down unit instead of requiring hand to pull it down would be nice. What I fear is the mesh cover over the roller. Would it hold up to use? Would it be replaceable or do I have to buy a new unit? Would it be harmful if the mesh cover breaks and I continue to use the Massager? Product came without plastic bags. Environmentally friendly. But also cannot be sure. Was it used? Don't know. Therefore, not exactly giftable. AC adapter and Car adapter are outside the zipped carrying case. Smart move for distribution. Overall. A keeper.
customer_reviews.author: CChu

customer_reviews.title: Helped strained neck muscle
customer_reviews.text: Muscle strain with spasms in neck and nothing really helped until I started using this! Flexeril, motrin, tylenol, heating pad, and aspercreme around the clock barely helped the pain and discomfort I was experiencing. After first use I noticed significant difference. It feels like a true deep tissue massage and even left me feeling a little bruised after repeated use, but the pain relief was amazing and so worth it. Fabric a little rough after a while but laid my silk robe in front of it and that helped alot. I always use the heated option.
customer_reviews.author: Reesy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this massage therapy!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ive bought this year !! Opened it immediately and tried it out ! I’ve suffered with knots in my shoulders and back since Christmas! This little dude is easy to use! You can put as much pressure on it as you want by how much you lean into it ! I used it sitting on my couch. And found out if i lean into it just right, starting at my lower back, it will slowly walk up my back on its own! Found knots I didn’t even know was there !! The heat was just right. And i love how the motion changed direction after a certain amount of time!
customer_reviews.author: heather soule

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Yes, YEEEEESSSS
customer_reviews.text: YES YES YES!!! A million times YES!!!! I just unboxed this thing and OMGEEEEEE!!! EXACTLY what I was looking for. I wanted something like the massagers at the nail salon, but did not want to buy a chair nor did I have a chair to put one of those covers on. Anyways this popped up and I am soooooo glad I bought it! Worth every single penny! It really kneads and feels like you are getting a massage. Not just vibrate like others I have purchased and returned. You aren't going to get a better bang for you buck than this so stop reading and click buy now already!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but may want to keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for a massager that works the back effectively- considering everyone’s work from home environment currently. I liked the fact that this is easy to install and does have the holders for your arms/hands. It DOES require to be plugged in to be used - was not a fan. It also stopped working after the first try. Had to unplug and wait for 5 minutes - then worked- again, not a fan. The modes of massage are three levels, but it didn’t actually provide much of an impact - again, primary requirement, and wasn’t a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Nithya Jayakumar

customer_reviews.title: Great Massager
customer_reviews.text: This massager is really good. My back was killing me last week so I rushed to amazon and purchased hindreds of dollars worth of items that I was hoping to help. Instead of using on my neck I positioned it on my back and let the balls work their magic. It has heat option and it also goes flr a while before cutting off. I have used it several times and I am happy. My only feedback would be to extend the cord that the plug goes into. A few times when I was moving it cam out. Love the storage case that was included.
customer_reviews.author: Qwandolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best $70 I’ve ever spent. I was nervous that it wouldn’t work, I so desperately needed this to work on my neck and lower back! I am beyond impressed and absolutely will use this daily. It took my pain away and felt amazing. The heat was on point l, it did take a bit to warm up so give it time. Product was package Le great, was not damaged or missing any parts. I will update after some use ex: if this product weakens or anything is less then five stars . But so far totally five stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness!!! I praise God for Amazon, InvoSpa, Shiatsu and anyone else involved in making this product and getting it to me. This is the best product I have ever received that honestly helps with my fibromyalgia pain since my husband passed away in 1997!!! I just used this as soon as I received it this morning and the results are amazing!!! Thank you, thank you, thank you! I'm totally overwhelmed! Never since Gary passed away have I received such a healing massage... and I have been to many massagers and chiropractors over the years. Needless to say, I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alene L Wesner

customer_reviews.title: Twenty minutes of use and dead
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday, I opened it, used it, and twenty minutes later it quit working. When I plug it in to the outlet the plug makes a whirring noise and gets hot fast. I’ve looked to see if I can get a replacement cord and they’re not available on Amazon. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: bornthisway

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good, but if you pull down with moderate ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, but if you pull down with moderate pressure, the rotors struggle. I would like it to be able to work with a little more pressure, so for the money, this particular brand/one is less quality than I would accept, but on the outside it looks good... HOWEVER, the seller was VERY good and responsive. They worked with me to arrange for a refund- 3.5 stars for the product, 5 stars for the seller- 4 star average.
customer_reviews.author: Eshopperaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I considered this one as a good purchase. I gave it 4 stars because the power button is hard to reach and there were couple times that I wore it upside down. It feels different when you wear upside down and I was wondering how come it didn’t feel like last time. After a while I realized that it was because I wore it wrong. The buttons supposed to be on your right hand side. And you should feel comfortable when your laid your neck back against to the massager. It feels good but I should it could go harder, but I understand that it maybe due to the safety issue.
customer_reviews.author: Shen

customer_reviews.title: For all intents and purposes, it hits the spot but it's no human
customer_reviews.text: As many would suspect, this massager is great if you go into it with relative expectations. Many of these will never be as detailed a massage or intuitive as a real person, but it's great for what it is. Keep in mind, the portion that contacts your skin is a mesh fabric that will definitely grab neck hair so overuse will cause your skin to become tender. The heating function isn't overly warm so don't expect heating pad temperatures. All in all, a fine massager if you don't want to spend much.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Malott

customer_reviews.title: Gets the knots out for sure
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my wife and she absolutely loves it. She uses it every day after a long day at work. I have also used it after golfing or just relaxing at home and it performs as advertised. There are two loops you have to put your arms through to hold the unit around your neck and shoulder and by pressing down you put pressure on the rollers to massage with stronger force. You could also massage your calves and feet as well. Overall I am very satisfied with this massager.
customer_reviews.author: Hackernation

customer_reviews.title: Wish you could lean back and relax
customer_reviews.text: The massager works well on your back and shoulders as long as you sit forward and hold it tightly in place. I wish it was more relaxing to use. You cannot sit back against the massager and it rides up if you do not hold it tightly in place which defeats the purpose of relaxing hurting muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Frickin Incredible.
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G this thing is a mother lovin’ godsend. I personally love tough massages. And this thing goes INNNNNNN. It’s incredible. There is a disclaimer to not use it longer than 30 minutes.. ABIDE BY GBAT DISCLAIMER! The first day my husband and I used it for like an hour each and the next day we were DEAD. Dead to the world. Could barely move.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Nathoo

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but doesn’t hold long
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but not as great as the product I previously used from another brand. It does not hold long enough. I purchased it in mid April and in early June the right side roller stopped working some times and made loud noises for every use. Oct 2 update: Button side is completely broken yesterday. I gave it 2 stars in my original review hoping it could last longer. I was wrong. It's no longer functioning well any more. Every time I turned it on, button side made loud noise and sounded nodes inside were misplaced. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Bling

customer_reviews.title: Freaking great
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with regular migraines and have invested in many different kind of massagers in my past. This massager is by far the best one I've come across for the price. I have a different Shiatsu massager and have difficulty massaging my neck with that one because of the awkward positioning. However with this massager, I was able to reach almost any muscle on my neck, shoulders, back and legs without interrupting my relaxed state in the moment. The straps really help with this in my opinion. Highly recommend if you struggle with migraines or headaches!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Moody

customer_reviews.title: Finally a massage I can rely on.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as advertised. Feels like a chair massage and hand massage all in one that can be moved all around the body. I have not used the heat setting yet but so far I really like this. This will be a great Christmas gift for anyone. The material is soft and leather. I think the storage bag is perfect and cute. Lastly, great deal on the price for all that you get with this product. Came in perfect condition and worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: More work than its worth
customer_reviews.text: If the pain is only along the sides of your neck, you'll probably enjoy this. If the pain is anywhere else, you will find yourself contorting into odd positions which only makes the soreness worse. I returned mine after deciding it was more work then it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Will break!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager but it’s a piece of s***! I’ve bought two and gifted one. Tempted to buy another but it’s made in China/ not meant to last and you’ll likely get laughed at if you try to get it repaired. So as much as I enjoyed this product, I’m distressed envisioning them piling up in a landfill or maybe some poor porpoise is blindly swimming around wearing it like an eye mask. So if you care about porpoises I recommend spending a few dollars on a couple lacrosse balls and start rolling! (Also, you can put them in a sock, which is especially good for rolling out either side of the spine.)
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first one after my friend who is a dentist recommended it. She often has neck and shoulder pain and found it helpful. We ended up buying two more for gifts later. Everyone loved it! The car charger makes long drives bearable...as long as you’re the passenger! As a driver I found it so comfortable to the degree it’s distracting. Customer service Danica was very helpful when we had an issue with the product!
customer_reviews.author: YH

customer_reviews.title: Got my neck kink out first use!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Good pressure and when balls switch rotation it hits other muscles. Feel good and got kink out my neck right away. As others said, I dont feel the heat but its nice knowing some heat is apparently there. Edit: as the unit stays on longer, the heat warms up! Can totally feel it! Nice case to take along. One wish is that the arm straps had a velcro attachment to strap it on so you don't always have to use your arms and hold it. But all in all I'm happy. Big shout out to Amazon. Delivery at checkout said Sunday..I needed this so bad, and Amazon got it here Thurs! Thx Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift and my mom loves it. Had an issue when it first arrived but the company reached out immediately and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. The travel case is super convenient so cords don’t get lost, everything packs away nice and neat :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: ok .... it's NOT a pillow - that is a misleading product description.
customer_reviews.text: When using the machine on my neck, or back of my head, I have to use a doubled over towel or an actual pillow between myself and the hard unforgiving massage balls. A pillow by definition is soft. The machine does work well - gets tight muscles loose wherever you can position the machine to work. Back muscles and the lower leg muscles seem to get the best relief.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Agazarm

customer_reviews.title: Just relax!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the InvoSpa, you can put it right on the area that is needed. There is a little warning tho because of the mesh that is on it, it's best that you put a cloth or clothing between the massager and your skin. The mesh can rub your skin a little raw.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Walker

customer_reviews.title: Honest review.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start off by saying, that I really do enjoy it for the most part. It's a bit painful at times though. I do the recommended time that it says is okay so that I dont overdue it. I have really bad neck, shoulder and upper back arthritis. So I'm constantly in pain. This does bring me some relief. But sometimes when I'm done using it, I cant help but feel like it bruises me. Probably not the products fault. I hold it down to make more pressure, to get the deep tissue. Like I said, I like it, but sometimes it makes it more uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Way better than a massage chair.
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing I wondered if it would just be a smaller and thus less useful version of a massage chair- but it is infinitely better! It has great pressure and can be moved to different parts of the body to get pain relief easily. Massage chairs never hit the right spots and are designed for someone much taller and bigger than me... but this really allows for anyone of any size to get the massage in the right places. I have chronic neck and shoulder pain and I feel better after using this for 30 minutes than I do after a deep tissue massage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1.5 months. Want a replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I first got it. It would help so much with my pain and sore muscles. Though, after a month and a half, the turning wheels activated by the motor became dull of edge and couldn't turn the massage roller balls anymore. Plus the motor just got weak from the sounds of it to begin with. It is useless now. I wish we could send it in for repairs or placement parts, but all in all the motor is just weak so this is bound to happen often no matter how often you get a new one. I do not recommend going through these problems for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Pa Vang

customer_reviews.title: Hands down (no pun intended) the BEST deep tissue massager for neck, back or any problem areas!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly- HONESTLY, this is the best thing I've found yet for my neck and lower back problems. I don't go to chiropractors or get human massages and no need cause this is better 😍. Its intense (or low settings available) and is there when I need it most! It's my favorite Amazon purchase yet, the seller is also kind and being offered a way to extend the warranty to 3 years was awesome. Thank you for having this available! I'm 29 and now can move like it 😅💜
customer_reviews.author: L_Kat

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED
customer_reviews.text: I have major issues with the muscles in my neck, attributed to my 9-5 desk/computer job. I do go for regular massages; however, my budget can't stretch more than 2 visits/month. I searched Amazon for this type of product, read a lot of the reviews, and decided to go for it. It is a WONDER! It really does a good Shiatsu massage; it's comfortable; it's EASY to use. With the provided tote, I took it to work and used it there -- AWESOME RELIEF and use it at home as well. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This does not work as effectively as I’d hoped. I had tried another brand at the state fair that worked great. I later bought this one, but it’s not nearly as good. The straps are too short, which means your shoulder blades are in a weird position when using it. There are several things that are awkward about it.
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor not sure if defective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today I tried it on the highest intensity as soon as I applied any amount of pressure to it the motor wanted to die completely . Actually it would start to die and then turn and run in reverse and then slow down again . Not sure if this unit was defective or just a bad joke either way I ended up having to return it .
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my wife, she uses is quite regularly and is very happy with it. I'm not sure how long it will last before the motor burns out, but it gets the job done and does a good job kneading the upper back muscles. I tried it out and was surprised at the depth of sensation. The best part is that I don't get bothered all the time to give my wife an upper back massage and it allows me to be the couch potato I was meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBird123

customer_reviews.title: Found A Gem
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the hopes that I could stop spending so much money on massages twice per week. I received it a few days ago, and have used it every other day...just amazing the pain relief I’ve had just after 30mins. Can’t believe I’m just now discovering this little gem. Not only it will save me money, but I feel so much better after 30mins of using this compared to an hour of someone massaging me. I love how portable it is, and even better I can pack it when I travel so relief is at hand even away from home.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Helps get rid of the knots in my shoulders and upper back
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my oldest daughter for Christmas (it was on her wish list) She raved about it so much that I got one for me too! It really works! It's a bit 'clunky' but easy to use and you can move it around so easily that you can really get it to the hit the tight spots and knots. The heat is subtle - more of a warming than "heat". I really enjoy this massage tool and recommend it to anyone who just needs to relax or suffers from back tension
customer_reviews.author: Sue LogsdonTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice massager. Has 3 adjustable speeds with heat if you like. I use it for neck and shoulders and on the higher speeds I can really it feel it massaging deep into the shoulders. Has a nice carrying case to keep it stored in along with a car charger.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a human massage
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It feels like a person giving you a massage. I’m very impressed. I love it for my neck but you can move it around to back, lower back, legs etc. This going to save me money because I will not need a massage as often at a spa. Again I cannot get over how much it feels like a real person giving a massage. I recommend 100%. The car charger is real helpful. I can’t wait to use it in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Nail Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother in law she has bad pain in her shoulders , I also myself have Rheumatoid Arthritis so if your reading this I won’t BS you ! This massager is great! It actually does relive pain. I love that it has heat. The only thing is there are certain places you just can’t hold it into place . But for your back , neck, shoulder areas.. it’s a wander! My mother in law loves it , and I have used it as well a few times and it’s really affective .
customer_reviews.author: HHughes

customer_reviews.title: It's not the rechargeable version
customer_reviews.text: This product works just fine, but I thought it was the one with a built in battery pack. It is not, so make sure you have a power outlet near where you want to use this. I used it a couple times with an extension cord and it worked fine except when I put a lot of pressure on it. When I loaded a lot of pressure, it would heat up and stall out. That is a great safety feature, but kinda frustrating when you are trying to work out a knot in your lower back.
customer_reviews.author: brad b.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I was at first not sure what to expect, it is like a shawl massager. My neck will get sore from odd postures I have to be in at work - and as my wife said, you keep doing that and you are gong to get stuck that way, don't tell her but she was right... This does help, and I am able to adjust the pressure it applies to me by how hard I press on the device. I like that it has a wall plug and a vehicle 12 v dc plug, I will be able to use this in the motorhome after a hard day of fishing, hiking, or building camp fires. 5 stars -
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: Super great investment!! Love, love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this! I use it every other day and feel the difference when I don’t. Worth the $50! I took it to work so everyone could test it out and buy it because it was that great. I just bought another for my mother. I always have shoulder and upper back pain and this really helps with that. The straps allow you to adjust how deep you want the messaging to be. I use this on the back of my head even, it’s so easy to use in any part of your body. Rotators will rotate and adjust to the part it’s messaging. Super great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Simental

customer_reviews.title: In order to use you need an outlet
customer_reviews.text: It’s OK. I really just hate how I literally have to be plugged into a wall in order to use this I feel like it is a little small, I am a short person so for my size I think it is OK however if you were to be a larger person you probably wouldn’t get the best out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Three levels of deep tissue kneading
customer_reviews.text: Some areas of my back can only take the softest level of kneading while others love the deepest level of kneading. Lower back pains are soothed enough to put me to sleep. The controls are so high on the arm that you can't see them making it difficult to use them. The massager is a little stiff so it takes constant manipulation to get the neck massaged. Absolutely love it on my back, but looking for a more flexible massager for the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I use it frequently and am able to really control the points it works on. I have yet to use it in the car but apparently you can. I would not be able to. I really wish this charged so I didn’t have to be by an outlet. That is the only thing I don’t like. Otherwise I use it several times a week on my neck and upper back. It helps ease all the tension and releases my muscles in my back.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely effective and I should know!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent thousands of dollars on massage and physical therapy. It great thing about this item is that you can use it on different parts of your body and can adjust it to just where you need it to be. I also use my hand to apply more pressure to do deep tissue massage.....really deep. You don't need to apply pressure however because it works perfectly well without it. I absolutely love it because now I can do deep tissue work and not even leave my house. I love the fact that I spent a little bit more for this item to have the heat and have the options that this item has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected... it’s so bulky that you can’t lay down with it
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use on the go, feels like real hands!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing massage product. Believe me when I say it feels like real hands on you. I use this on my shoulders, back (upper and lower), hands, feet. There are different setting options to play with to get it just right for whichever body part you’re wanting to massage. I can use it while studying, lounging around, and even in the car because it comes with a car cord. Everyone enjoys borrowing this when they see me using it and can’t believe how it feels! I will be gifting over the holidays. Oh, I can’t forget to mention the to die for heat feature, amazing in all seasons as the heat temperature is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Cadie

customer_reviews.title: I have chronic back pain. Spinal deformity and this is a lifesaver for me
customer_reviews.text: Ohhh sweet baby Jesus this thing is just what I needed . I have a massager mounted on a chair that works the same way but doesn't get those areas on my neck. I have one of those hook style self massage tools, again great for specific knots in hard to reach areas but cant really get the neck area and able to give that rubbing motion to relieve that tension. Ive had a headache for 3 weeks and after using this thing... Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for in-home massage
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this product to me because I have major back and neck/shoulder pains. It's nice to have this available at home to help massage my muscles. It's not like going to get a real massage, but it works well. It's slightly bigger than I thought and you have to plug it in, so you can't just sit anywhere to use it. Also, it has a heating feature, so you want to make sure that you are not using it over their recommended time, or it could end up getting too hot and burning you. It heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Noh

customer_reviews.title: This thing works and feels incredible
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm giving it five stars because I absolutely love it it feels great it's versatile as far as being able to place it where you need the massage This kind of sounds like a testimonial. I just got it and it really does feel great I don't know how long it'll last I'm certainly hoping a long time but I have a bad back and shoulders and this is really convenient kind of a portable massage chair. For a rambling review I guess I'm saying I recommend it I got it on a lightning deal so of course a bargains a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

product_meta.title: Shiatsu Back shoulder & Neck Massager With Heat - Deep Tissue 3D Kneading Pillow Massager for Neck, Back, Shoulders, Foot, Legs - Electric Full Body Massage - for Home & Car
feature_bullets: 8 Massage roller balls - This shoulder massager comes with 4 Big nodes and 4 small nodes, which provide deep tissue massages on your neck, shoulders, upper back, lower back, waist, Foot, Tights, calves, legs, feet and arms - helping your full body parts To release stress, relieve sore muscles, and help you relax.
Adjustable intensity - This neck massager pad has 3 speed strength levels, which allow you to get the right and appropriate amount of pressure to relieve your muscle pain.

2 Massage directions - built in a Bi-directional movement control to mimic the motion of in-person massage experience. This 3D Shiatsu massager will auto-reverse each minute for better distribution of massage effects.
Heat function - with Infrared Heat, our neck and shoulder massager can be used to ease muscle tension, stress and promote blood circulation.

Portable and durable - This neck and back Massager includes a wall power adapter and a car charger, so you can have an electric self massage in your home, office or car when you are traveling. This back massager also comes with a durable carry bag, so you can take it with you anywhere! This Shiatsu kneading massager pillow is the perfect gift for your loved ones!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
